item.title: Deep Dive: Cloud Backup for Slow Connections, Part II
item.description: This is the second post in my deep dive series on cloud backup for network attached storage (NAS). In this article, I’ll walk through preparing the test machine and describe the tools I used to evaluate candidate backup clients.

item.title: Deep Dive: Cloud Backup for Slow Connections, Part I
item.description: In case further proof were needed, last month’s story about the companies that lost irreplaceable data in a literal towering inferno proves again that everyone with important files needs offsite backups.
